wikipedia_page.main: George Vaughan Stephenson (22 December 1901 – 6 August 1970) born in Dromore, Co. Down was an Irish rugby union player and doctor. Stephenson played club rugby for Queens University, North of Ireland, Middlesex, the London Hospital, Haileybury College, London Irish and Barbarians and international rugby for Ireland, winning forty two caps and holding multiple rugby records
